resources.string: There are three different Tabs that allow for quick navigation between menus. Use these tabs to choose to View, Share or Add recipes. Please report issues to: smarttechnologynow@gmail.com

My Recipe Box Pro was created by Smart Technology Now on December 18th 2012. Smart Technology Now is a company focused on providing smart technology solutions for our customers. You can contact Smart Technology Now at smarttechnologynow@gmail.com
